page.title: 13The countrydweller Part 2
page.content: their cars available for people to use where there is urgent need and for essential shopping etc.at a small fee.When asked about shopping problems he told us that in the main there were no serious problems but being in such a specialised trade he did have related difficulties such as obtaining special canvasses and woods for framing,and these he had to obtain by post.With normal shopping items he said that there were certain problems which forced him to make a special trip to Carmarthen about once a month.Like most countrydwellers he grows all his own fresh produce for which purpose he owns about 1/2 acre of land.When asked about pets he told us that he had three large guard dogs because of the risk of being broken into due to the remoteness of his home.
